attributes.name: Hanging Sack
attributes.description: Whatever is in this sack, it would be disastrous if it touched the ground.

attributes.name: Hanging Wicker Bowls
attributes.description: These bowls dry super fast when you suspend them from the ceiling.

attributes.name: Huangjiu Amphora
attributes.description: This sweet yellow wine is often referenced in classical Chinese literature. The highest quality huanjiu is aged in clay jars for up to twenty years.

attributes.name: Imitation Bone Wreath
attributes.description: Despite its realistic appearance, this bone wreath was actually whittled from basswood.

attributes.name: Impossible Geometry Notes
attributes.description: Looks like some notes about geometryâ€¦ But not any kind of geometry you've ever seen.

attributes.name: "Improbable Pagoda" Painting
attributes.description: A black ink painting in a bamboo frame. The four-floor pagoda depicted here is quite peculiar: nearly all pagodas have an uneven number of floors.

attributes.name: Iron Cannonballs
attributes.description: These cannonballs never saw action in battle.

attributes.name: Iron Cup
attributes.description: Completely safe to drink from. I swear!

attributes.name: Iron Jug
attributes.description: An old iron jug, usually used for milk. But if you wanted to, you could put all sorts of things in this.

attributes.name: Iron Pan
attributes.description: A cast iron pan. Grandmas everywhere love them. They don't make 'em like they used to.

attributes.name: Iron Wok Set
attributes.description: A wok is an incredibly versatile piece of cookware. You can make almost anything in it.

attributes.name: "Journey's End" Painting
attributes.description: A beatific painting in an arched silver frame. To a pirate, there's no sight more beautiful than a port that he had given up hope of ever reaching.

attributes.name: Letter of Marque
attributes.description: An old letter of marque - once a free pass to pillage and terrorize, now just a fond memento.

attributes.name: Letter-writing Set with Brush Drying Rack
attributes.description: With this handy drip-dry brush rack, you'll always have a fresh brush ready to go.

attributes.name: Light Wicker-Wrapped Jug
attributes.description: The contents of this basket-wrapped jug are a complete mystery.

attributes.name: Long Iron Chain
attributes.description: You could use it as a swing, if you have really good balance.

attributes.name: Map of Aeternum
attributes.description: This map of Aeternum is beautiful, but unfinished. There's still much left to discover.

attributes.name: Maritime Place Setting
attributes.description: The tranquil color encourages your guests to linger over dessert.

attributes.name: Meal Prep Set
attributes.description: You're ready to create a culinary masterpiece. Now all you need is the food.

attributes.name: Moderate Drinking Set
attributes.description: This drinking set is used to imbibe alcohol in moderation, and in accordance with all local laws and statutes.

attributes.name: "Mountain Dawn" Painting
attributes.description: A painting that captures the essence of an Aeternian sunrise within a fine oak frame. The painter nearly drove herself mad trying to capture the passing of autumn with the coming of winter.

attributes.name: Natural Clay Amphora
attributes.description: This jar is tough enough to stand up to daily use. Usually filled with wine, beer, or oil.

attributes.name: Oar-nament
attributes.description: Even in the golden age of sailing, sometimes you've got no choice but to row.

attributes.name: Old Books Row Long
attributes.description: These books are in remarkably good condition, considering the sorry state of the ship they came from.

attributes.name: Old Books Row Short
attributes.description: These books are your all-time favorites, and deserve a place of special honor.

attributes.name: Old Books Stack
attributes.description: You haven't had time to put these books back on the shelf. Perhaps you're too busy reading.

attributes.name: Old Placesetting
attributes.description: A well-worn place setting that has held years of delicious meals.

attributes.name: Old World Globe
attributes.description: You'll never see the world outside Aeternum again. But at least you can look at this globe.

attributes.name: Open Book
attributes.description: You're determined to finish this book before your friends spoil the ending.

attributes.name: Ottoman Tea Set
attributes.description: This beautiful mixed-metal tea set was crafted in one of the finest workshops in Damascus.

attributes.name: Paper-wrapped Parcel
attributes.description: What could be inside? Some ancient instinct is warning you not to open it.

attributes.name: Passive-aggressive Wall Note
attributes.description: A note left from your roommate telling you to put your clothes away. Wait, don't you live alone?

attributes.name: "Pine Bonsai" Painting
attributes.description: A black ink painting in a bamboo frame. The tight, precise brushstrokes that make up the pine needles have a courtly air.

attributes.name: Pirate Jewel Box
attributes.description: When your ship is being pursued by howling ghosts, you can look at this loot and know that it was all worth it.

attributes.name: Pirate Rigging
attributes.description: These ropes are so beautifully rigged, they could bring an old sailor to tears.

attributes.name: Pirate Rum Crate
attributes.description: An ingenious pirate managed to smuggle a whole shipment of fine cognac out of France by disguising it in these humble rum bottles.

attributes.name: Pirate Sign
attributes.description: Seeing this sign outside a tavern door lets you know that you're in for a fun and wholesome time.

attributes.name: Pirate Weapon Arrangement
attributes.description: A selection of fine weapons, taken off the bodies of adversaries who made the mistake of fighting fair.

attributes.name: Powder Horn
attributes.description: Contains black gunpowder. Keep the lid on, and don't bring it into the kitchen.

attributes.name: Protective Straw Wreath
attributes.description: This little guy will guard your door. Any would-be burglar will run for their lives upon seeing it.
